titleStmt.title: Report of Supervisors of the Oil Tax
titleStmt.author: [- - -] epiterretai elaikou of Karanis

revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: [To - - -, from - - - and the other] supervisors of the oil tax of Karanis. We have submitted to you for registration the monthly account of the aforesaid supervision, during which nothing was collected, and we have received the duplicate receipt for the period from the 1st to the 30th of the month Hadrianus of the present 17th year of Aurelius Antoninus Caesar the lord.;17th year of Aurelius Antoninus Caesar the lord. Tybi 1.;It has been filed . . .

listBibl.bibl: Husselman EM, TAPA 89, 132-137, 1958 -- SB VI 9635 Husselman EM, PMich IX, 544, 1971
